sentence: Location is perfect just across the road from the beach
for a family vacation it may be better to go just south of Fort Lauderdale to Hollywood Beach or Sunny Isles where the beachfront hotels are on the beach itself which makes it more convenient
4th of July Stay cation great with the kids on the beach STAFF WAS EXCELLENT
The balcony terrace over looking the ocean were incredible
it is a fabulous hotel and it is right across from the beach
We had a balcony room with sea view for 3 nights
As I checked in I was extremely happy with the comfortable mattress and balcony view of the ocean
Our room was spectacular with commanding ocean and intra coastal views looking south
Scott was very helpful to us while we enjoyed the sun and ocean

Great location to restaurants shops and the beach if you are tempted by the brown water and sea wedThose at reception seemed quite entitled acted as though we were an inconvenience to them when checking in
I will start by saying that if I could give a 25 I would because it was a halfway decent stay due primarily to the atmosphere the ocean weather peaceful and beautiful environment
Still the best on the beach and in all SFLA
Nothing compared to W South Beach
First Big complaint after being out for the whole day at the beach
I was told because they did not account for the sand and salt in the air when positioning the bar is why they do not have the tvs
The beach was highly disappointing literally the bus stops right at the beach entrance 0
The up charge for additional beach equipment is embarrassingly high
Fine but then when I get to the beach my resort fee only includes 2 chairs and 1 umbrella
I would suggest if the chairs are vacant for an hour they are recycled for others it ’s what they do with the beach chairs here
Anyway we usually stay at the Harbor Beach Mariot when in Fort Lauderdale and will be returning there
I refused to go to the pool afterwards music was also far to loud and went to the beach which was very nice
